name: Floribella
storyline:
In the game, Floribella falls asleep and has a dream that involves Magda and Delfina in a chase of Count Máximo.

When the game begins, Magda releases a spell on all the animals in the Garden against Floribella and turns them into evil creatures.

The Wicked Witch prevents Floribella from meeting Count Máximo, because Delfina intends to marry him, even against her will.

This will allow Delfina to buy some time and run away with Count Máximo. Floribella will have to rid the world of the witch's plague by freeing the animals from the evil spells. She will also have to prevent the Count from falling into Delfina's clutches.

It all happens in a fantastic version! Definitely an adventure not to be missed!
summary:
Floribella is a platformer game released by Move Interactive in partnership with SIC, based on the second season of the Portuguese soap opera, Floribella.

In this game, you can play as Floribella or Count Máximo and explore three different game scenarios, the Garden, the Mansion and the Palace.

It features several missions and at the end of each mission, the player will have the opportunity to face super enemies.
